Drive East from Cleveland. Take I77 S to I480 E to US 422 E and head north on OH306. OH 87 also goes through Russell's Township Center.
Drive North from Akron. Take I77 N to I271 N to US 422 E and head north on OH306.

value: has a large geodesic dome, visitor center, and rock garden.
is a Township Park with an interactive visitor's center and nature center. Take the trail to Ansel's Cave and see the many waterfalls.

Take a drive down Dines Rd. It is notable for its many hills (watch out for joy-riders) and pastoral scenery.
The Fairmount Arts Center on Fairmount and Rte. 306 is a teaching arts center that has public music and dance performances and art galleries.
An heirloom at Novelty Shop Antiques.
The Driving Range on OH87 has some food, or for a cheap bite pick up a snack at the Circle K.
